channel.title: Halo wallet links on official webpage not working
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
QT Wallet, Client Wallet (and version) or Web wallet: Halo 1.37 running on a Win 10 machine
The problem I am having is ....
Hi Guys,
I am trying to upgrade my Halo wallet that has 83000 coins in it and I cannot get the official links from the Bitbay webpage to work. Is there an alternative site to download the new wallets from or is this a temporary break thatwill be fixed soon?

item.title: Halo wallet links on official webpage not working
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

I just tested the Client download links at https://bitbay.market/downloads/

They all seem to be working fine. Have you tried again recently?

Read full topic
item.source: Halo wallet links on official webpage not working
